## UgduRuntime.start() method

Starts this project. All `app`<!-- -->s(usually only one) which should be active will be mounted to the `document`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
start(): Promise<any>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;any&gt;
